caption: This is a scene inside a courtroom. Inside the courtroom, there are many people. Two men are seated in the audience area, one wearing a black suit, and the other wearing a gray suit. On the bench of the courtroom, there sits a judge, and in the chair below the judge, there is a female. This woman is testifying with visible emotion, her eyes appearing somewhat moist. Suddenly, the man in the gray suit stands up, approaches the woman, and begins questioning her. At the same time, the man in the black suit and the judge are both closely observing the proceedings.
